content: this legal text summarizes a court case regarding the succession of a deceased individual the court declares that the deceased individuals wife referred to as pdo is the sole heir and determines the share of the estate that each party is entitled to the court rejects a claim to dissolve the community inheritance property and a counterclaim brought by another party the court concludes that the plaintiffs claim for the opening of the succession and establishment of the heirs is valid while the counterclaim lacks sufficient evidence the court emphasizes the importance of providing proper documentation and evidence in legal proceedings ultimately the court accepts the plaintiffs claim offsets the costs of the litigation and makes a final ruling on the case the ruling states that the succession was opened on april 29 1991 and pdo is entitled to twothirds of the estate while the heirs and their descendants are entitled to onesixth of the estate the court rejects the claim to dissolve the community inheritance property and the counterclaim brought by another party the court orders that all parties involved in the litigation be fully compensated for their costs the ruling was made on february 1 2014 by the court in salerno

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale di Salerno sez. II, 02/18/2013, n.477
